originalText.text: Wouldn’t trust anyone else but Bethany and the team at Whistle & Wag with my pup. They truly take care of him as if he were their own, as well as help correct any bad walking behaviors. I don’t know what I would do without them!

text.text: Wouldn’t trust anyone else but Bethany and the team at Whistle & Wag with my pup. They truly take care of him as if he were their own, as well as help correct any bad walking behaviors. I don’t know what I would do without them!

originalText.text: So happy to have been recommended the Whistle & Wag team!! From day #1 they have taken such good care of our pup on his daily walks (thank you Sam & Ana!!). Always on-time and reliable, and I love the pics and notes they send after each walk. Would send anyone looking their way! The best!

text.text: So happy to have been recommended the Whistle & Wag team!! From day #1 they have taken such good care of our pup on his daily walks (thank you Sam & Ana!!). Always on-time and reliable, and I love the pics and notes they send after each walk. Would send anyone looking their way! The best!

originalText.text: Whistle & Wag did an incredible job with our puppy. Every member of their team connected with him and he looked forward to his walks with W&W as some of the highlight of his day. It’s very obvious that they really care and treated this as more than a job or obligation which was such a terrific thing to have in a large and sometimes tricky city like New York. We are truly lucky and grateful to have been able to work with such a great dog walking service.

text.text: Whistle & Wag did an incredible job with our puppy. Every member of their team connected with him and he looked forward to his walks with W&W as some of the highlight of his day. It’s very obvious that they really care and treated this as more than a job or obligation which was such a terrific thing to have in a large and sometimes tricky city like New York. We are truly lucky and grateful to have been able to work with such a great dog walking service.

originalText.text:
If I could give Whistle & Wag 10 stars I would! As a veterinarian in the West Village, I dealt with many walkers and walking companies, and Whistle& Wag is by far the best of the best.

I recently moved out of NYC, and saying goodbye to the Whistle & Wag crew was one of the saddest parts of my move.  Bethany and her staff are so caring, knowledgeable, and trustworthy, and really took their time with my dog, Heidi (who can be a challenge!).  They really went above and beyond, sending updates after every walk and taking adorable pictures of Heidi walking around the city.  I never worried about Heidi while she was in their hands.  Scheduling is incredibly easy, and they can usually help even with last minute requests.  They can also take your dog to their veterinary appointments!

If you are looking for a new dog walking service or thinking of changing your walker, I  recommend Bethany and Whistle & Wag above all others!

originalText.text: I have had the best experience with Whistle & Wag over the last year with my girl Maya ❤️  Bethany and Nikki are amazing! I completely trust them to pick her up, walk her, and keep her safe while I’m working! They have been so wonderful/flexible when I have last minute issues come up and need additional walks for Maya. Most recently they have also been extremely helpful while my girl is in heat and can’t actually go to dog parks or play with too many other dogs. It’s such a relief knowing that she’s in great hands!
